topics.body:
I thought of something: porn video games can be profitable; the reason why we're not seeing any major company try to make them from a financial standpoint is that the video game industry currently has a really nasty habit of drastically going over budget with games.

In order for porn games to be profitable you would have to make sure that the staff knows that they can't not go a penny over.  There could be lots of porn games in the future if the people in charge of them knew how to budget money.

I know it's not a porn game, but going over budget is what killed off the bioshock and dead space franchises; they went so far overbudget that no matter what they did they could never make that money back.


People are so used to being allowed to go vastly overbudget it's why so many companies are fucking up hard right now is that they don't see a budget, instead they see a blank check.  If a major company started making porn games on the side it could be profitable if they put people who actually know how to keep within budget in charge.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
